Html:
I cannot use SDK and compile a demo projects.
This is becasue I have VS without C# I think.
Is this possible to make in in native C++ ?

I'd like to see some possibility to display demos in fullscreen mode (of course with multimonitors support).
That could make one monitor the additional part of desktop.

 

But I'm afraid about resources, due to my previous message about...

You are correct, the demo source code is in C#, you'll need that Visual Studio component to compile Touchless Demo.
Someone has expressed interest in re-implementing the demo in VB. Perhaps you'd like to do so in Visual C++?

Fullscreen is quite possible without much additional resource usage (through image scaling).
I encourage you to investigate multi-mon support and share your work with other eager fans of Touchless.
I'll be happy to link to related projects on Codeplex, or even host great demos/applications/games in our codebase.

Thanks!
Â - Mike Wasserman
